###################
nose-mocha-reporter
###################

Mimic default Mocha test reporter


INSTALL
=======

::

    python setup.py install


USAGE
=====

::

    nosetests --with-mocha-reporter

.. image:: capture.png
   :align: center


KNOWN PROBLEMS
==============

* Default Nose output is not fully removed (e.g. verbose mode)


LICENSE
=======

* WTFPL
